common algorithms

Analysis procedures for Hydroroot.

Define a set of methods to ease the analysis and simulation.

hydroroot.analysis.intercept(g, dists, dl=0.0001, max_order=None)[source]

Compute intercepts at given lengths from collet.

Parameters

  • g (-) –

  • dists (-) –

  • dl (-) –

  • max_order (-) –

Returns

- intercepts

Return type

list of number of intercepts according to distances in dists

hydroroot.analysis.nb_roots(g, l, root=1, dl=0.0001, max_order=None)[source]

Compute the number of segment intercepted at a given length.

Parameters

  • g: MTG

  • l: length

  • root: the root vertex from which the tree traversal start

  • dl: length of MTG segments (use for g.property(‘mylength’) calculation

  • max_order: maximum order of considering roots

Return type

  • number of segment

hydroroot.analysis.read_data(data)[source]

Merge data and return a Dataframe.

Download the source file ../../src/hydroroot/analysis.py.
